General.Name: Platinex Inc
General.Description: Platinex Inc., together with its subsidiaries, acquires, explores for, evaluates, and develops mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, zinc, arsenic, barium, antimony, copper, mercury, molybdenum, tungsten, and platinum group element deposits. Platinex Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
